resources.string: Droid Notification Plus connects the screen and displays the notification bar native android when you receive a notification of the selected applications.
Do not switch the screen between the hours below
Tap here to select the applications that will turn on the screen when you receive notification
Tap here to set the seconds to keep the screen turned on
When activated, the screen connects at its maximum brightness. Some devices require the maximum brightness to view notifications
Do not turn in your pocket
When enabled, prevents the screen plug in your pocket
Turn on the screen by gestures
When activated, the screen connects only through gestures over the proximity sensor (consumes more power)

When activated, the screen connects all the time you take the device out of his pocket, so you can see the time and other phone information. This option is enabled if the proximity sensor be covered by more than 3 seconds and then is discovered (consumes a lot of battery)

Some handsets from Samsung are activating the services they read aloud to each transaction made ​​on the device automatically. While Samsung does not correct the problem, you can disable the services below:
Tap here to disable the service
